## initializeAppCheck() function

Activate App Check for the given app. Can be called only once per app.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function initializeAppCheck(app: FirebaseApp | undefined, options: AppCheckOptions): AppCheck;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  app | [FirebaseApp](./app.firebaseapp.md) \| undefined | the FirebaseApp to activate App Check for |
|  options | [AppCheckOptions](./app-check.appcheckoptions.md) | App Check initialization options |

<b>Returns:</b>

[AppCheck](./app-check.appcheck.md)
